// a=1 b=2 c=a+b a=0 b=1 (a&(a|b))
00000100001000000000000000000001 //a = 1
00000100010000000000000000000010 //b = 2
00000000011000010001000000000000 //c = a+b
00000100001000000000000000000000 //a = 0
00000100010000000000000000000001 //b = 1
00010000011000010001000000000000 //c = a|b
00011000100000010011000000000000 //d = a&c
